Hospital.Controllers
Class PatientController

java.lang.Object
  Hospital.Controllers.PatientController

@SystemAPI
public class PatientController
extends java.lang.Object

Used for patient-related actions that are handled by a nurse

Constructor Detail

PatientController

@SystemAPI
public PatientController(WorldController wc,
                                   NurseController nc)
Creates a patientController to register a new Patient.

Parameters:
wc - The WorldController to add the patient to.
nc - The NurseController that adds the patient.
Throws:
ArgumentIsNullException - wc or ac was null.
Method Detail

registerPatient

@SystemAPI
public java.lang.String registerPatient(java.lang.String factoryName,
                                                  ArgumentList args)
This creates a new Patient and adds it to the hospital.

Parameters:
factoryName - The factoryName to add a person with.
args - The name of the patient in a StringArgument.
Returns:
The name of the patient that was made.
Throws:
NotLoggedInException - If the nurse was logged out.
NotAFactoryException - If the factory's name was not found.
SchedulableAlreadyExistsException - If the patient already existed.
InvalidArgumentException - If the ArgumentList was of the wrong size, null, not answered or of the wrong type

getAvailablePatientFactories

@SystemAPI
public java.lang.String[] getAvailablePatientFactories()
Returns the names of all factories that makes patients.

Returns:
Array of names of the factories.
Throws:
NotLoggedInException - If the nurse was logged out.

getFactoryArguments

@SystemAPI
public ArgumentList getFactoryArguments(java.lang.String factoryName)
Returns the arguments of the chosen factory that makes patients.

Parameters:
factoryName - The name of the factory to search the arguments of.
Returns:
The arguments.
Throws:
NotLoggedInException - If the nurse was logged out.
NotAFactoryException - If the factory was not found.
